description: Values returned by Apache Frontend instanciation

accepted-slave-amount.description: Amount of Slaves allocated to the Instance which are deployed

slave-amount.description: Total amount of Slaves allocated to the Instance (include blocked ones)

reject-slave-amount.description: Rejected Amount of Slaves allocated to the Instance which are not deployed

rejected-slave-list.description: List of slave instances references which are rejected

domain.description: Base domain used by the instance
